name: Janni Amir

specials.name: Elemental Endurance
specials.description: A janni amir can survive on any Elemental Plane for up to a 1 week, after which it takes 1 damage per hour until it leaves or dies.

specials.name: Change Size
specials.description: Frequency Once per day. Effect The janni amir changes a creature's size. This works as a 4th-level  enlarge or shrink spell but can target an unwilling creature (DC 28 Fortitude save negates)

specials.name: Elemental Protection
specials.description: Requirements the janni amir has been on a Elemental Plane for less than a week. Effect The janni amir can designates an ally within 30 feet to temporarily gain the benefits of Elemental Endurance long as it remains within 100 feet of the janni amir. The janni amir can have up to  5 allies benefiting from Elemental Endurance.  Any ally added in excess removes an ally of the janni amir's choice.  All allies lose this benefit if the janni amir starts taking damage from the Elemental Plane.

spells: plane shift (to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane only)
create food, invisibility (x3), speak with animals
